titles.title: It's That Old Ship Of Zion

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
It's that church in the book of Revelation;
It's built on a Rock, on a firm foundation.
It's been through the storm,
And the storm couldn't turn it.
It's been through the fire,
And the fire couldn't burn it.
It was fed to the lions,
But the lions couldn't eat it.
It's fought a lot of wars,
But it's never been defeated.
It's that church triumphant, O yes!
And it's built by the hand of the Lord.
